alert.note: Alert for Madison (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:07AM CDT until July 24 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL MADISON...PIERCE...NORTHEASTERN ANTELOPE AND SOUTH CENTRAL KNOX COUNTIES... At 207 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles north of Plainview, or 22 miles northeast of Neligh, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Plainview around 210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Osmond and Pierce. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
